website_summaries.verdict: The Razer Edge Pro gaming tablet is the rare device that reimagines what the PC experience should be and delivers something that's not just different, but better. That it's made to let you game anywhere just makes it a lot more fun.
pros: Fantastic, innovative design offers a better gaming experience
Powerful components with an Intel Core i7 processor and Nvidia mobile graphics
Flexible tablet and dock design lets you play anywhere
cons: Expensive when all the accessories are taken into account
Can't match standard gaming laptops for performance

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was great but!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a windows tablet for months. I wanted something versatile to replace my work PC and can be used for gaming. Once I saw this and for the price I was happy, until. This thing has been a nightmare, right out the box the sound didn't work. So I had to figure out what was wrong. Got that fixed, then the video drivers weren't installed correctly, given me errors when I tried to launch the control panel. I fixed that. Now I can play my games,so far it's working ok, but I get this annoying screen flicking and dimming. Haven't figure this out yet, but I certainly would buy one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dion J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have to thank Amazon for the fast global shipping. I was waiting now for about 1 year, til it was possible, to get this great device. I really was jealous, that we in Germany weren't able to buy this tablet. But now everything is okay, Amazon made it possible, thanks again. Now to you guys at Razer, you really did a good job, design this device. I hope there will be another Razer Edge in future, I really love this device. For me and I think many other fans, it is really a pity, that you stopped the Razer Edge and the accessories. For now I am happy, thumbs up!!!!! Sorry for my English. Bye
customer_reviews.author: Neo2672

customer_reviews.title: The best tab
customer_reviews.text: pros; Full powerful pc in a tab Long lasting battery for normal use ( Not gaming ) Loud speakers Good after sale support. cons: NO 3G or 4G connection . For me the most important missing feature I would rate this pc 5/5 with it. Heavy weight charging port not in a good position should be some thing from behind the tab not effecting the edge. I think the drivers or programming could be improved since there are some blinking windows with the start.
customer_reviews.author: Salman

customer_reviews.title: A Gamer's Mobile Dream
customer_reviews.text: Can't pry this from my husband's hands!! It has literally taken the place of his desktop, which is top of the line with dual monitors. (He's a PC gamer.)
customer_reviews.author: Tigerjayde

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I can't describe how much I love my Razer Edge. It's just perfect, I take it with me everywhere and I can do everything with it. I'm sad that could only afford the 64gb but if it's that good, the best one must be like heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Your only choice for tablet PC gaming
customer_reviews.text: I created a full review on youtube:  Windows 8 has been good once you get used to it. I installed "classic shell" to get my desktop / start menu from Win7 back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tablet, the only minor issue is with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet, the only minor issue is with the screen quality, but for the functionality and price it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: WOW..all I can say
customer_reviews.text: this has been my new favorite device. my pc and laptop are getting jealous, but with the dock and wireless keyboard and mouse, I can play all my games on a 50 inch tv...
customer_reviews.author: Harley Smith

customer_reviews.title: the only thing keeping it from 5 star is the price
customer_reviews.text: this tablet will handle any game you throw at it. it is pricey but you simply cannot get anything even close to its power in a tablet formfactor.
customer_reviews.author: mdwm

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet with more than enough speed.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet overall but the accessories are overpriced and if you planned on using a stylus don't bother with this tablet. Manufacturer says any stylus at a local electronics store will work. I tried multiple types of stylus' and did not find one that would work for handwriting or drawing on this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Husted

customer_reviews.title: It is just wonderful taplet I never had before!!
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for this a long time already! because thay are always be sold out on Razer Official website. And i finally found it in amazon!! And it works just wonderful ! I mean I truly love it ! It is great for either gaming ro check on website or anything you doing with your normally computer, and the special thing of this tablet is because it got a NVIDIA GT 640M LE graphic card and Intel Core i7-3517U processor in here so it will doing great job on most fancy PC games as well !! And is really fresh experienci when you play a game by only holding this with Razer Edge Gamepad Controller on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Wang

customer_reviews.title: When it works it is great! Unfortunately it's almost always broken and getting it ...
customer_reviews.text: When it works it is great! Unfortunately it's almost always broken and getting it fixed costs a minimum of $100 or so dollars just to have them look at it. Overall incredibly disappointed because it's a great idea and was a great pad buy just would not work
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Use the tablet every day for work. It doe's have a bit of weight to it but not enough to take away from the quality of the product. I do recommend some sort of stand/dock while gaming though because the back top-right corner can pump out some heat. Runs Bioshock Infinite, Civ V, Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon, Etc.. at medium-high settings while having a consistently high frame rate. If you have the extra money, hop on board.....if you plan on purchasing all of the accessories (dock, keyboard dock, ext battery, gamepad controller) I'd say purchase the Blade instead unless you want that portability and options.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent graphic in games as expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent graphic performance in games Very Light when compared to laptops Fast Windows 8 The bad side is battery charge time and i wish it had hdmi out directly on the machine (you have to buy dock unit to have hdmi out )on itself, but it is acceptable
customer_reviews.author: egemen gokdemir

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but not for everybody
customer_reviews.text: well this is a gaming laptop and definitely not for the average user, its raw power is awesome and everything opens in a snap. one downside is its heavy. To me battery life of 4hrs is not of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: JBJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, not a single problem with it in a few months of use. cant wait for keyboard attachment. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: thomasc

customer_reviews.title: Razer edge pro
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with the edge pro was that the keyboard button at te too didn't work which is very minor since there are multiple ways to open it
customer_reviews.author: Robie Renfrow

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great device! Exactly what I expected, runs applications and games like a breeze! Careful though it can heat up pretty quickly during gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: good, but with one problem
customer_reviews.text: Razer does not sell the docking station anymore. And the battery does not stand for gaming hours without it. Other than that, is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Adenisio Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: An awesome tablet , love be able to pplay games on the train into work, great graphics and sound buy it
customer_reviews.author: richard hunter

customer_reviews.title: I love the razer but....
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone, Recently purchased a razer edge and I really love it, as far as a windows tablet goes its what u would expect but the add-ons are a problem since u cannot buy them anywhere for a normal price. I've been looking to score a dock for over a month now without luck it's not available for sale anywhere except for scammers on ebay trying to sell it for 3 or 4 times the original price. Guess I'll have to wait till nobody wants it anymore for the prices to go down.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Zijdenbos

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I move this Tablet and how awesome powerfull it is. Important thing is you shouldnt expect it to as powerfull as a full Tower PC, but it is still surprisingly Nice. Aldo, you should badly buy a wireless keyboard and mice to get the Best of it. It becomes hit (on air vents) very qucly, but the temperature is stable qnd never causes anu trouble to the défice.
customer_reviews.author: Heitor Rossi Machado

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming and if you already have a pc you can sync it to the tablet and it runs on its own without controling your pc
customer_reviews.author: Lavon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: i love my new razer edge!!! it's sleek and looks awesome it has a high end spec to play games and for work use.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Tandiawan

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good but I wish it had support for a stylus similar to that of the Microsoft Surface. You cannot play games with your fingers alone. There is no HDMI unless you buy a docking station. Also it has no media card support. If it had stylus support I would have given it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just buy it... dont fear the price because its worth it (one thing i want razer to fix)
customer_reviews.text: the tablet (or computer) is very fast and has awesome graphics due to its video card and its i7 processor works great. Something which has been bugging me is the wifi receiver... its not as fast as a normal laptop and i know its not my internet but i would also like some support from razer to see if its a driver update or something that im missing. apart from that, best tablet ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixel on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Well, the razer edge work great and is super powerful (for its size). However the screen is a major problem, it have a dead pixel right at the centre of the screen. Contact Razer support about it and they said "However, a few abnormalities among the millions of sub pixels are quite possible and a certain number of abnormalities on your screen would be considered acceptable. This consideration of a certain number of abnormalities on a IPS panel applies to all manufacturers, not just Razer." seriously, dead pixel on this awesome product is just a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Isinfur

customer_reviews.title: Best GADGET i EVER Bought first ever AMAZON REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: its amazing product its a big tablet with gaming LAPTOP power I have owned the first asus gaming mini laptop, m11x alienware, now this and i am i am impressed it does everything i want FAST and it plays games on the go im amazed playing starcraft 2 on the way to work and pretty much anything i throw its way its worth every penny its gona cost to get the full effect but it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Paul Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Accessories in limited availability
customer_reviews.text: Best and only Windows tablet for pc gaming. The only thing holding it back is the limited availability of accessories and some quality issues with the controller dock. *Update September 7, 2013 After a few months of light use the case around the exhaust vent has warped. System gets extremely hot very quickly. I'm expecting this thing will be dead soon after the 12 month warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holiday

customer_reviews.title: The New God
customer_reviews.text: The single most advanced piece of technology you will ever hold in your entire life. more powerfil than most laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet...Dead Pixel. :(
customer_reviews.text: My Edge Pro has a Dead Pixel and its really making me sad. Considering how expensive it is it should be PERFECT. But it has a Dead Pixel and I don't know what to do cause I love it already... Help Please.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Would be better off getting an NES
customer_reviews.text: 8 months I've had this thing and have not been able to get any of the advertised accessories!! Only about 5 hrs of gameplay on it and it freezes on startup 50% of the time. Would be better off getting an NES. waste of money, has 1 mode not 3. no dock no hdmi.
customer_reviews.author: anthony delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Product ke6
customer_reviews.text: Lovely design,but horrible anti-user friendly experience compared to Apple I am 47 and my eyesight has gone down..and this thing is asking me to enter a product key with the smallest characters you have ever seen Pure torture so far Gonna have to use a magnifying glass Terrible experience
customer_reviews.author: gerald

product_meta.title: Razer Edge Pro 256GB Tablet
product_meta.description:
The Razer Edge Pro is powered by Intel Core processors and NVIDIA GeForce graphics powering a 10.1” high definition multi-touch display, and a rugged high-speed solid state drive that screams incredible performance in a portable form-factor.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Intel Core i7-3517U 1.9 GHz (4 MB Cache)
256 GB Flash Memory, 8 GB RAM Memory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars100 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
